MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML7 postcode area of Shotts. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:00pm to complete repairs on our underground cable network located on Victoria Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:20pm on Sunday, 01 November 2020
